ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Heap overflow in ACL mode

Description

Heap overflow in ACL mode

Risk Assesment: 7.8

CWE

787

CVE

18614

Attack Surfaces

Controller Implementation (MITRE EMB3D PID-11)

Attack Vectors

DoS (MITRE EMB3D TID-404)

Buffer overflowOut of Bounds (MITRE EMB3D TID-327)

Defenses

Check size before copy operations, Armonize BLOC buffer size with the actual size used elsewhere
